alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Cortland; Madison; Northern Oneida; Onondaga; Southern Oneida; Tioga; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 11:02AM EST until January 17 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow showers with periods of heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations reported across the area is 2 to 5 inches. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches through the early evening. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Oneida, Onondaga, Chemung, Tompkins, Madison, Cortland and Tioga counties. * WHEN...Until 5 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow has picked up in coverage an intensity, which is expected to remain until the mid-afternoon when the low will pass through the area. Additional lake effect snow is expected later tonight into Tuesday, with a few more inches of snow possible in localized areas.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for New York can be found at 511ny.org, or by dialing 5 1 1 from within the state.

area.areaDesc: Chemung; Cortland; Madison; Northern Oneida; Onondaga; Southern Oneida; Tioga; Tompkins
